text: w'idha qil lhwla' almjadlyn fi tawhid allah w'ifradh balebadt: atabieuu ma 'anzal allah ealaa nabih muhamad salaa allah ealayh wasalam qalu: bal natabie ma kan ealayh abawuna min alshirk webadt alasnam, ayfelwn dhlk, walaw kan alshaytan ydewhm; btzyynh lahum su' aemalhm, wakufrihim biallah 'iilaa eadhab alnaar almster?
